channel.title: Deep Space 9 on Newres Al Haider
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Space 9 on Newres Al Haider

item.title: Prolog and the Price of Peace
item.description: The use of logic is a common element in Science Fiction. In the Star Trek universe Vulcans are a species that is famously known for aiming to live by logic and reason. Because of this they are often considered masters of these subjects. Yet there was a case in an episode of the Star Trek show Deep Space 9, where Quark, a Ferengi, was able to convince Sakonna, a Vulcan, of the error of her logic and reasoning.
